projects.name: HotSpot
projects.description: An Android application for automatically commecting to a Wi-Fi network by scanning a network name + key combination. HotSpot was an official entry to NWHacks 2018 where we had 24 hours to complete the project.

projects.name: DigiExpress
projects.description: This web app mock-up was built with ASP.NET deployed in Azure and uses Azure databases. DigiExpress is a store where a user can buy and choose the parts for a laptop/desktop computer. This web app includes a feature for having items in a cart as well as viewing order history.

projects.name: Blog Generator
projects.description: Blog Generator is a simple python script that converts a json file (containing the blog contents and details) to a static web page (in html). The aim of this project is to make blogging easier and avoids hosting costs (free with Github pages)

projects.name: HeproTech
projects.description: a device for securing contents in a case where a user can enable "secure mode" and receives alerts via a notification on a monile phone if someone else comes close to the secure case. Hepro-tech was an entry to CalgaryHacks where we had 24 hours to complete the project.

projects.name: Habit Manager
projects.description: This app was part of my group school project. Habit manager is an app that tracks habit tasks that a user might want to accomplish on certain days of the week. You can also visit other user's profiles and follow them to know when they have successfully completed a habit task.
